channel.title: BigQuery on Daniel Mejía Raigosa

item.title: Googles BigQuery and Go
item.description: Notes BigQuery(BQ) is Google’s serverless, highly scalable, enterprise data warehouse SQL-like query language Real time data analysis by “streaming ingestion” capability Deals with gigabytes to petabytes of data volume Offers data encryption and data access permissions via Cloud Identity and Access Management Machine Learning and Bussiness Intel can be easily integrated with BQ Support for Geospatial data Interacting with BQ To interact with the BQ we can use:
